\'http://rtax.criteo.com/delivery/rta/rta.js?netId=\' + escape(crtg_nid);\ncrtg_url += \'&cookieName=\' + escape(crtg_cookiename);\ncrtg_url += \'&rnd=\' + crtg_rnd;\ncrtg_url += semi-loud">&#39;Take care where you fly your Christmas drone&#39; says ex-RAF helicopter pilot</h1>\n\n\n        \n            <!-- news headline / lead story -->\n\n    <div class="article-hero          <div class="fotorama-feature fotorama-fullscreen-element fotorama-show-full-screen">\n                <div class="fotorama-caption-btn bg-default">\n                    <span class="caption-state">Show caption</span>\n                    <i class="fa fa-info fotorama-button" aria-hidden="true"></i>\n                </div>\n\n                <div class="fotorama-close-btn fotorama-button bg-default">\n                    <i class="fa fa-times" aria-hidden="true"></i>\n                </div>\n            </div>\n\n            <div class="fotorama-wrapper">\n                <a id="fotoramaTrigger" class="fotorama-hide-full-screen" href="#"></a>\n                <div class="fotorama-overlay">\n                    <span>\n                        <i class="fa fa-camera" aria-hidden="true"></i> (<span class="fr-gallery-photo-count"></span>) <span class="fr-gallery-view-button">View gallery<span>\n                    </span>\n                </div>\n              <div class="clearfix"></div>\n            </div>\n        \n    </div>\n\n<div class="article-credits clearfix">\n    <div class="author-details tiny">\n        <p>\n            \n            <span data-format="article-display"\n                data-show-date="always"\n                data-show-time="today-only"\n                data-timestamp="1482130874"\n                itemprop="datePublished"\n                class="timestamp formatTimeStamp"\n                full-date="19.12.2016">\n            </span>\n            \n             /\n                \n                <a href="/author/profile/76938.Andy_Ffrench/" class="author-name primary-color loud">Andy Ffrench</a>\n                \n            \n        </p>\n    </div>\n</div>\n\n\n<div class="mobile-social data-share-headline="&#39;Take care where you fly your Christmas drone&#39; says ex-RAF helicopter pilot">\n    <span class="fa fa-twitter"></span>\n</button>\n<button class="button button-with-icon custom-sharing bg-googleplus mobile-hide" data-share-url="https://plus.google.com/share?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.heraldseries.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fhswallingfordnews%2F14974545.__39_Take_care_where_you_fly_your_Christmas_drone__39__says_ex_RAF_helicopter_pilot%2F%3fref%3Dgplrec" data-share-path="">\n    <span class="fa fa-google-plus"></span>\n</button>\n<button class="button button-with-icon custom-sharing bg-linkedin mobile-hide" data-share-url="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&amp;url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.heraldseries.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fhswallingfordnews%2F14974545.__39_Take_care_where_you_fly_your_Christmas_drone__39__says_ex_RAF_helicopter_pilot%2F%3fref%3Dlnkref&amp;title=%26%2339%3BTake%20care%20where%20you%20fly%20your%20Christmas%20drone%26%2339%3B%20says%20ex-RAF%20helicopter%20pilot%20%28From%20Herald%20Series%29&amp;summary=%0A++A+FLYING+expert+has+warned+people+who+buy+a+drone+for+Christmas+that+the+devices+could+have+the+same+effect+as+a+bird+strike+if+they+collide+with%E2%80%A6+" data-share-path="">\n    <span class="fa fa-linkedin"></span>\n</button>\n<button class="button button-with-icon custom-sharing bg-pinterest mobile-hide" data-share-url="http://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.heraldseries.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fhswallingfordnews%2F14974545.__39_Take_care_where_you_fly_your_Christmas_drone__39__says_ex_RAF_helicopter_pilot%2F%3fref%3Dpinrec&amp;media=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.heraldseries.co.uk/resources/images//&amp;description=%0A++A+FLYING+expert+has+warned+people+who+buy+a+drone+for+Christmas+that+the+devices+could+have+the+same+effect+as+a+bird+strike+if+they+collide+with%E2%80%A6+" data-share-path="">\n    <span class="fa fa-pinterest-p"></span>\n</button>\n<a href="whatsapp://send?text=%26%2339%3BTake%20care%20where%20you%20fly%20your%20Christmas%20drone%26%2339%3B%20says%20ex-RAF%20helicopter%20pilot%0A%0Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fwww.heraldseries.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fhswallingfordnews%2F14974545.__39_Take_care_where_you_fly_your_Christmas_drone__39__says_ex_RAF_helicopter_pilot%2F%3fref%3Dwa" class="whatsapp-link">\n    <button class="button button-with-icon bg-whatsapp" >\n        <span class="fa fa-whatsapp"></span>\n    </button>\n</a>\n<a href="/my/account/emailthispage/" class="email-link" onclick="var s=s_gi(\'newsquestgroupprod\'); s.events=\'event31\';s.linkTrackVars=\'eVar2,eVar4,eVar5,eVar6,eVar10,eVar16,eVar17,eVar18,eVar19,eVar25,eVar43,events\';s.linkTrackEvents=\'event31\';s.tl(this,\'o\',\'Email to a friend\');">\n    <button class="button button-with-icon bg-default">\n        <span class="fa fa-envelope"></span>\n    </button>\n</a>\n<button class="button button-with-icon custom-sharing-toggle" data-share-url="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&amp;url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.heraldseries.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fhswallingfordnews%2F14974545.__39_Take_care_where_you_fly_your_Christmas_drone__39__says_ex_RAF_helicopter_pilot%2F%3fref%3Dlnkref&amp;title=%26%2339%3BTake%20care%20where%20you%20fly%20your%20Christmas%20drone%26%2339%3B%20says%20ex-RAF%20helicopter%20pilot%20%28From%20Herald%20Series%29&amp;summary=%0A++A+FLYING+expert+has+warned+people+who+buy+a+drone+for+Christmas+that+the+devices+could+have+the+same+effect+as+a+bird+strike+if+they+collide+with%E2%80%A6+" data-share-path="">\n    <span class="fa fa-ellipsis-h"></span>\n    <span class="fa fa-chevron-left" style="display:none;"></span>\n</button>\n\n<a href="#comments-anchor" class="small comments-button"><span class="fa fa-comments"></span> 1 comment</a>\n\n</div>\n\n\n<div id="responsive-cta"></div>\n\n\n<div class="article-body small">\n    <div>\n        <p>\n  A FLYING expert has warned people who buy a drone for Christmas that the devices could have the same effect as a bird strike if they collide with an aircraft.\n</p>\n<p>\n  Matt Williams, 32, a former helicopter pilot, said people should avoid using the popular flying machines in their back gardens and could cause serious injury if they did not abide by strict safety rules.\n</p>\n<p>\n  The ex-<a href="/search/?search=RAF+Benson&amp;topic_id=5963" target="_self">RAF Benson</a> instructor runs Crowmarsh Gifford-based Aerial Motion Pictures, which runs training courses for people using drones, and sells them.\n</p>\n<div class="advert-container tiny"><div id="DFP_in_article_mpu"></div></div><p>\n  The father-of-two, who runs the company with wife Natalie, said: "Back in 2008 I was flying a Puma helicopter in Iraq at about 150ft and there was a bird strike \xe2\x80\x93 a seagull hit me in the chest and knocked me unconscious and my co-pilot had to make an emergency landing.\n</p>\n<p>\n  "We could have been killed. The bird strike blew the door off the helicopter, and a drone hitting an aircraft could have a similar effect.\n</p>\n<p>\n  "Drone sales do increase at Christmas time and people who fly them need to know the regulations and abide by them.\n</p>\n<p>\n  "You can not fly a drone within 50 metres of people, vessels, vehicles or structures so for most people flying one in your back garden would be ruled out.\n</p>\n<p>\n  "Four hundred feet is the maximum height for a drone and without a permission for commercial operation you need to stay 150 metres away from congested areas."\n</p>\n<p>\n  Aerial Motion Pictures was one of the UK\xe2\x80\x99s first companies providing practical knowledge needed for full Civil Aviation Authority Commercial Unmanned Aerial Vehicle certification to fly a drone.\n</p>\n<p>\n  The firm offers commercial training courses for individuals and companies who use drones, and also sells drones to the public, as well as businesses.\n</p>\n<p>\n  Mr Williams was a helicopter instructor with the RAF for 13 years, rising to the rank of Flight Lieutenant before he left to concentrate on his business.\n</p>\n<p>\n  He added: "Lots of people buy drones online at Christmas time but they need to be aware of the restrictions and regulations.\n</p>\n<div class="advert-container tiny"><div id="DFP_in_article_2"></div></div><p>\n  "If people buy a drone at this time of year they should take great care \xe2\x80\x93 they need to know the regulations and make sure they know how to fly the drone safely."\n</p>\n<p>\n  Mr Williams said large drones with a diameter of about 1.5m could cost from \xc2\xa35,000 to \xc2\xa310,000.\n</p>\n<p>\n  A training course run by the company called Icarus costs \xc2\xa31,000 for two days or \xc2\xa31,700 for three days.\n</p>\n<p>\n  The company, which offers a range of commercial drone licensing courses as well as aerial filming, photography and retail services for companies, is expanding.\n</p>\n<p>\n  Mr Williams said: "We are franchising our training courses out to Canada and they will be run by about 20 staff."\n</p>\n<p>\n  In September last year <a href="/search/?search=%22Thames+Valley+Police%22&amp;topic_id=6004" target="_self">Thames Valley Police</a> revealed that 31 incidents involving drones had been reported in the two years up to September 2015 but more recent figures have not been released.\n</p>\n    </div>\n    <div class="clearfix"><!-- clear --></div>\n</div>\n        \n\n        <div id="DFP_teads"></div>\n\n        \n\n\n        \n        \n        <div class="mobile-social v2 small end-social">\n            <button class="button button-with-icon bg-fb custom-sharing" data-share-path="http://www.heraldseries.co.uk/news/hswallingfordnews/14974545.__39_Take_care_where_you_fly_your_Christmas_drone__39__says_ex_RAF_helicopter_pilot/?ref=fbshr">\n    <span class="fa fa-facebook"></span>\n</button>\n<button class="button button-with-icon bg-twitter custom-sharing" data-share-url="https://twitter.com/share?url=" data-share-path="http://www.heraldseries.co.uk/news/hswallingfordnews/14974545.__39_Take_care_where_you_fly_your_Christmas_drone__39__says_ex_RAF_helicopter_pilot/?ref=twtrec" data-share-headline="&#39;Take care where you fly your Christmas drone&#39; says ex-RAF helicopter pilot">\n    <span class="fa fa-twitter"></span>\n</button>\n<button class="button button-with-icon custom-sharing bg-googleplus mobile-hide" data-share-path="">\n    <span class="fa fa-google-plus"></span>\n</button>\n<button class="button button-with-icon custom-sharing bg-linkedin mobile-hide" data-share-path="">\n    <span class="fa fa-linkedin"></span>\n</button>\n<button class="button button-with-icon custom-sharing bg-pinterest mobile-hide" data-share-url="http://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.heraldseries.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fhswallingfordnews%2F14974545.__39_Take_care_where_you_fly_your_Christmas_drone__39__says_ex_RAF_helicopter_pilot%2F%3fref%3Dpinrec&amp;media=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.heraldseries.co.uk/resources/images//&amp;description=%0A++A+FLYING+expert+has+warned+people+who+buy+a+drone+for+Christmas+that+the+devices+could+have+the+same+effect+as+a+bird+strike+if+they+collide+with%E2%80%A6+" <button class="button button-with-icon bg-default">\n        <span class="fa fa-envelope"></span>\n    </button>\n</a>\n<button class="button button-with-icon custom-sharing-toggle" data-share-path="">\n    <span class="fa fa-ellipsis-h"></span>\n    <span class="fa fa-chevron-left" style="display:none;"></span>\n</button>\n\n<a href="#comments-anchor" class="small class="message small">Sorry, an error occurred.</span>\n    </div>\n\n        \n            <div class="comment-status light-background small semi-loud">\n                 <a href="/my/account/log-in/" rel="nofollow" class="login-callback">Sign in</a> or <a href="/my/account/register/?ref=newsart_comment" rel="nofollow">Register</a> to leave a comment and/or receive comment alerts.\n            </div>\n        \n\n        \n    \n\n    \n            <!-- Comment-sorting controls. -->\n            <form action="" class="commentSort">\n                <select name="commentSort" id="commentSort" class="semi-loud muted">\n                    <option selected="selected" value="oldest">Sort comments by oldest first</option>\n                    <option value="newest">Sort comments by newest first</option>\n                    <option value="score">Sort comments by highest scored</option>\n                </select>\n            </form>\n\n            <!-- Existing comments go here. -->\n            <div id="comments-list" data-article-id="14974545" class="wider">\n        \n\n            \n                <div class="comment light-background x-small " id="comment_17523848">\n\n            \n\n                        <span class="small semi-loud comment-username">\n            \n                \n                            xenarthra\n                \n            \n            \n                        </span>\n\n                        <span class="tiny timestamp" data-short-time="true">10:23am Mon 19 Dec 16</span>\n\n                        <div data-comment-id="17523848" class="x-small quiet muted comment-body">\n                \n                            <p>\n  "You can not fly a drone within 50 metres of people, vessels, vehicles or structures so for most people flying one in your back garden would be ruled out. "<br>\n  <br>\n  This is not strictly true. This applies only to "small unmanned surveillance aircraft" -- i.e., drones equipped with cameras (and even then, it applies only to structures, vessels, etc. owned by other people, not to your own property).<br>\n  <br>\n  If your drone weighs under 7kg and isn\'t being used for surveillance, the rules are simply to maintain direct, unaided visual contact with it, and to fly it only if reasonably satisfied that the flight can safely be made.\n</p>\n                \n            \n                            <p class="tiny timestamp last-edited" data-short-time="true">Last edited: 10:48pm Tue 20 Dec 16</p>\n            \n                        </div>\n                        <span id="comment_17523848_sources" style="display: none;">\n                            <span row="set" id="comment_17523848_full"> "You can not fly a drone within 50 metres of people, vessels, vehicles or structures so for most people flying one in your back garden would be ruled out. "\n\nThis is not strictly true. This applies only to "small unmanned surveillance aircraft" -- i.e., drones equipped with cameras (and even then, it applies only to structures, vessels, etc. owned by other people, not to your own property). \n\nIf your drone weighs under 7kg and isn\'t being used for surveillance, the rules are simply to maintain direct, unaided visual contact with it, and to fly it only if reasonably satisfied that the flight can safely be made.</span>\n                            <span row="set" id="comment_17523848_name">xenarthra</span>\n                            <span row="set" id="comment_17523848_display"><p>\n  "You can not fly a drone within 50 metres of people, vessels, vehicles or structures so for most people flying one in your back garden would be ruled out. "<br>\n  <br>\n  This is not strictly true. This applies only to "small unmanned surveillance aircraft" -- i.e., drones equipped with cameras (and even then, it applies only to structures, vessels, etc. owned by other people, not to your own property).<br>\n  <br>\n  If your drone weighs under 7kg and isn\'t being used for surveillance, the rules are simply to maintain direct, unaided visual contact with it, and to fly it only if reasonably satisfied that the flight can safely be made.\n</p></span>\n                        </span>\n\n            \n                        <div class="comment-controls" data-id="17523848">\n                            <!-- Misc controls. -->\n                            <div class="r-align">\n                \n                                <button class="button button-inverse button-transparent tiny comment-report" id="r_17523848">Report</button>\n                \n                            </div>\n\n                \n\n                            <!-- Comment scoring. decodeURIComponent(src[name]) : \'\';\n}\nfunction isMobile() {\n\n    if (typeof MobileDetect !== "undefined") {\n        var md = new MobileDetect(window.navigator.userAgent);\n\n        if (window.screen.width < 728) {\n            return true;\n        }\n\n        var isMobile = (md.phone() === null) ? false : true;\n\n        return isMobile;\n    }\n\n    return (window.location.hostname.toString().indexOf(\'m.\') === 0);\n}\n\n</script>\n<script type="text/javascript">\npath = document.location.href.split("/");\nvar prop30 = qs.get(\'lp\');\nvar prop43 = thsi is wrapped in an article tag\n        $(\'#DFP_high_vis\').parent().remove();\n\n        $(\'#sectionHomepageSport .content .articles-list (typeof path[x] == \'undefined\')\n    {\n        path[x] = \'\';\n    }\n\n    if(path[x] == "" || (pType == "ArticleModule" && path[x].match(/[0-9]+\\./)) || (path[x].indexOf(\'?\') > -1))\n    {\n        path[x] = path[x-1];\n    }\n    else\n    {\n        path[x] = path[x-1] + "/" + path[x];\n    }\n    path[x] = path[x].replace(/\\/undefined/g,"");\n}\nsitename = path[2].split(".");\n\npathN= unescape(document.location.pathname.toString());\nmatches = pathN.match(/(\\w+)\\.(in|near|compare)\\.([\\,a-zA-Z0-9\\ _-]+)[\\/]?$/);\ndetailMatches = pathN.match(/(\\w+)\\.detail\\.(.*)$/);\nif       return \'Property.\' + \'Oxford\'+ \'.Site Section.\' + path[3];\n\n     }\n }\n\n _qoptions={\n     qacct:"p-42Bk1WKC7O3WM",\n     labels:quantcastLabelBuilder()\n };\n </script>\n <script result.segments.length; i++) {\n    quantSegs += result.segments[i].id + "|";\n }\n}\n</script>\n<script type="text/javascript" src="http://pixel.quantserve.com/api/segments.json?a=p-42Bk1WKC7O3WM&callback=qc_results"></script>\n<script type="text/javascript">\n\nvar known = $.cookie(\'__siren\') ? \'1\' : \'0\' ;\n\nfunction filterArray(arr) {\n    var retArr = [];\n    $.each(arr, function(i, part) {\n        if (part !== \'\') {\n            retArr.push(part);\n        }\n    });\n\n    return retArr;\n}\n\nfunction addToTargeting(targeting, data) {\n\n    $.each(data, function (key, value) {\n        if (!value) {\n            return;\n        }\n        targeting[key] = value;\n    });\n    return targeting;\n}\n\n// values in the below MUST be strings\nvar targeting = {\'context\' : \'Travel\',\n                \'al\': \'l\',\n                 \'domain\' : \'www.heraldseries.co.uk\',\n                 \'isLanding\' : \'no\',\n                 \'top_path\' : \'news\',\n                 \'weather\': \'sun\'.toLowerCase(),\n                 \'jbsjs\': \'\'.toLowerCase(),\n ,\n                 \'site\' : (isMobile()) ? \'mobile\': \'desktop\'};\n\nif (typeof MobileDetect !== "undefined") {\n    targeting.canbb = (window.screen.width > 960) ? \'y\' : \'n\';\n}\n\nif (typeof module_targeting === "object")\n{\n\ttargeting = addToTargeting(targeting, module_targeting);\n}\n\n// criteo add\nif (crtg_content !== null &&  crtg_content !== \'\') {\n    crtg_split = filterArray(crtg_content.split(\',\'));\n    if (crtg_split !== null && crtg_split !== \'\') {\n         targeting = addToTargeting(targeting, {crtSegs : crtg_split});\n    }\n}\n\n\nif (typeof gs_channels !== \'undefined\')\n{\n    targeting.gs_channels = gs_channels;\n}\nquantSegs = decodeURI(quantSegs.toString());\n\nqcParts = filterArray(quantSegs.split(\'|\'));\n\nvar qcWhiteList = {\'3607\' : 1, \'3590\' : 1, \'11129\' : 1, \'3616\' : 1, \'12087\' : 1,\n                   \'3419\' : 1, \'3589\' : 1, \'3597\' : 1, \'3626\' : 1, \'3588\' : 1,\n                   \'3614\' : 1, \'3596\' : 1, \'3606\' : 1, \'28346\' : 1,\n                   \'23511\' : 1};\n\nvar cleanQcParts = [];\n\n$.each(qcParts, function (i, val) {\n    if (typeof qcWhiteList[val] == \'undefined\') {\n        return;\n    }\n\n    cleanQcParts.push(val);\n});\n\n// an array is valid\ntargeting.qcSegments = cleanQcParts;\n\ntargeting  = addToTargeting(targeting, qs.decode(\'\'));\ntargeting  = googleNetworkCode = 154725070;\nvar googleId = \'/\'+googleNetworkCode+\'/\'+googleSiteName+googlePath;\n\nif (googleId.charAt(googleId.length - 1) === \'/\') {\n    googleId = googleId.slice(0, -1);\n}\n\nif (typeof MartiniBrightcove !== \'undefined\') {\n    MartiniBrightcove.setGoogleId(googleId);\n}\n\nconsole.log("googleId = " + googleId);\n\nvar googletag = googletag || domExclusionList = {};\n\n\n\nvar adUnits = [];\n$.each(unfilteredAdUnits, function (i, unit) {\n    // VAST (video) ad units never get displayed in here.\n    if (unit.isVast) {\n        return;\n mobile site\n            var sizes = data.sizes;\n            if (data.alternate_mobile_size && isMobile()) {\n                sizes = data.alternate_mobile_size;\n            }\n            // push this ad slot through\n            dfp = googletag.defineSlot(googleId, sizes, data.domName)\n                .addService(googletag.pubads())\n                .setTargeting("position", data.positionName)\n                .setCollapseEmptyDiv(data.collapseContainer);\n            // check if we have an array of targets, and assign them as a companion if we do\n            if googletag.enableServices();\n\n    if (isMobile() && inter.checkVisit()) {\n        googletag.pubads().addEventListener(\'slotRenderEnded\', function(event) {\n            if (event.slot.d.position[0] === \'interstitial_mpu\' && !event.isEmpty) {\n                inter.init();\n            }\n        });\n    }\n});\n\n// set up the amazon tags\ntry {\n the dom exists\n    if ($(\'#\'+data.domName).length === 0) {\n        return;\n    }\n\n    if (data.domName === \'DFP_interstitial_mpu\') {\n        if (!inter.checkVisit()) {\n            return;\n        }\n    }\n\n    // are we manually loading it?\n    if ($(\'#\'+data.domName).attr(\'data-manual-loading\') === "yes") {\n        // console.log(data.positionName + " is manually loading");\n promotes local businesses? Find out <a href="/ad-faq/#disable" target="_blank">how to turn off your ad-blocker</a>.</p></div></div>\';\n$(\'body\').append(content);\n\ndocument.addEventListener(\'sp.blocking\', function (e) {\n    console.log(\'Event "sp.blocking" triggered.\');\n\n    var articleId = \'14974545\';\n    var events = "event70";\n    var hideFromUsers = false;\n    var hideFromSubscribers = false;\n    var module = \'ArticleModule\';\n\n    // Are we hiding this from signed-in users?\n    if (hideFromUsers) {\n        if (typeof utag_data !== \'undefined\' && typeof utag_data.user_is_logged_in !== \'undefined\') {\n            if (utag_data.user_is_logged_in === \'yes\') {\n                console.log(\'User signed in; not showing banner.\');\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    // Are we hiding it from subscribed users?\n    if (hideFromSubscribers) {\n        if (typeof paywall !== \'undefined\' && paywall.paywall_user_current_plan !== \'\') {\n            console.log(\'User is a subscriber; not showing banner.\');\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    if ($.cookie(\'nqab\') === \'false\') {\n        events += \',event74\';\n    }\n\n    // Don\'t show warnings on the user module pages.
